summary: We’re happy to announce we’re starting our countdown to preorders! I hope you’re looking forward to seeing our contributors'...
caption:
We’re happy to announce we’re starting our countdown to preorders! I hope you’re looking forward to seeing our contributors’ beautiful pieces, because we can’t wait to show them to you!

Preorders will open on May 20th!

Remember, all the profit of the zine will be donated to the Make-A-Wish foundation.

blog.name: jumpin-juniper
blog.title: wolfy husbando
blog.description: a dumb artist who rarely draws. perpetually obsessed with bnha.

summary: Oh wow, yet another BNHA oc?? No way. Yes way. I’m making an entire class of ocs and a few teachers,,, perhaps a few villains...
caption:
Oh wow, yet another BNHA oc?? No way.

Yes way. I’m making an entire class of ocs and a few teachers,,, perhaps a few villains too.

Meet Fuubi, your friendly neighboorhood freak. She’s the kind of kid to make you eat a spider or bring a centipede to show-and-tell. Maybe she’s got a few screws loose.

Her tongue is split, it isn’t supposed to be a reptile tongue. I wasn’t sure how to convey that Xp

Oh yeah she’s also a massive raging lesbian. We stan a gay slug queen.

blog.name: kingofthewilderwest
blog.title: Checkmate
blog.description:
Haddock | 26 | he/his/him
Hablo inglés y español.

Hello hello! Call me Haddock! Dedicated Dragonmarker, FMA obsessee, music composer, professional linguist, and all around fandom nut.

HTTYD + other fandom analysis blog. NOT SPOILER FREE, but all spoilers and topics tagged thoroughly. My ask response times are slow, but feel free to stop in to chat! Please don't send book/show/etc. recommendations - thanks!

Expect a decent helping of other fandoms like FMAB, GF, LOTR, and VLD. I have a separate video game blog for Undertale and Mass Effect.

blog.description: Hi there! This is a personal and homo sport Translation Blog. Please before you ask any question make sure to read the info link. All of the translations and fanarts are posted with artist permission. This is not a spoiler free blog. You have been warned.

summary:
Oblivion chapter 4 is up~

 Katsuki and Izuku are now pro heroes and best friends, but Katsuki has a secret. He is in love with...
description:
Oblivion chapter 4 is up~

Katsuki and Izuku are now pro heroes and best friends, but Katsuki has a secret. He is in love with Deku, but the latter is oblivious to his feelings so Katsuki decides to bottle everything up as he sees Deku jumping from relationship to relationship. When Izuku goes to him after a failed date for advice, Katsuki finds himself right back where he started. Now if only Deku looked his way.

blog.name: the-damnedest-fandom-pit
blog.title: BNHA and my other shameful interests
blog.description:
Keep up with my art on Twitter! @NexusAkayuki (only adults or you'll be blocked.)
I love Bakugou with a passion and I'd literally die for Kirishima Eijirou's happiness, the world does not deserve him, he is too good. OTP is KrBk but I literally do not dislike a single ship. Nexus | 25歳 | 1月20日 | They/Them | Main blog: the-damnedest-creature
I have been in VK hell since 2008. Absolute j-rock garbage. Which is why this place exists, to keep my anime trash interests off my main jrock blog. There will be gay ships here. BNHA mostly.

summary: "DOING MY BOYFRIEND'S MAKEUP"  ...Beauty YouTuber Katsuki Bakugou does makeup on his boyfriend for a video. I might shade this...

“DOING MY BOYFRIEND’S MAKEUP" 

…Beauty YouTuber Katsuki Bakugou does makeup on his boyfriend for a video.

I might shade this one day, … but for now I think I like it as is.

blog.name: ao3feed-bakudeku
blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: Spicy Citrus
description:
by Qrainee

A messy ‘it’s just sex’ story about Katsuki Bakugo’s rise to fame.

–Somewhere along the line Izuku had picked up another job other than being a lackey; he became an official fuck buddy with Kacchan. Neither of them remembered when it started or knew when it was going to end. Before or after an event Bakugo would come knocking and they’d get down and dirty. Izuku had started to depend on those nights. He wasn’t sure what was happening to his head, but he loved every second they were together.

–When Midoriya finds out he’s not the only one Bakugo has been fooling around with and an Indie singer wants to swipe Izuku away, what will Katsuki do?

**No songs are mine, BNHA is not mine**

Words: 1635, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M, M/M, Multi
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku, Kirishima Eijirou, Kaminari Denki, Uraraka Ochako, Jirou Kyouka, Todoroki Shouto, Iida Tenya
  • Relationships: BakuDeku - Relationship, Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki & Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, Bakugou Katsuki/Kaminari Denki, Midoriya Izuku/Uraraka Ochako, Iida Tenya/Uraraka Ochako, bakukiri - Relationship, bakukami - Relationship, Kirishima Eijirou/Midoriya Izuku
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Rock Band, literally a Bakugo bowl, BakuHo, fuck buddies, Just Sex, Smut, Fluff, angst? yeah I guess so, kacchan - Freeform, Deku - Freeform, horny boys stuck in an apartment, oh dear i wonder what will happen
